articles.title: Harvey Weinstein found guilty of sexual assault after New York retrial

articles.content:

The conviction is in addition to a 16-year sentence that Weinstein has yet to serve after being convicted of sex crimes in Los Angeles.

articles.title: 'Uranus is weird.' Big moons of tilted ice giant hide a magnetic mystery, Hubble telescope reveals
articles.description: Scientists find surprising evidence that space dust is shaping the surfaces of Uranus' largest moons.
articles.content:
Uranus and two of its moons, Miranda and Ariel.
New data from the Hubble Space Telescope suggests that Uranus' largest moons are gathering dust — literally.

articles.title: Harvey Weinstein found guilty of sex crimes after retrial
articles.description: Harvey Weinstein has been found guilty by a jury in New York of sex crimes in a retrial after a state appeals court last year overturned the former film producer's 2020 conviction.
articles.content:
A jury in New York has found Harvey Weinstein guilty on a sex crimes charge, though the jury has not yet reached a verdict on all counts the former movie mogul faces in deliberations that have been marred by infighting and threats.

articles.title: Harvey Weinstein found guilty on one charge in New York sex crimes retrial
articles.description: Weinstein was found guilty of sexually assaulting Miriam Haley, but was acquitted of a second charge of sexually assaulting Kaja Sokola
